name: Space Invaders (itch) (Tereza Kadlečková)
description: Who doesn't know good old Space Invaders, right? Well I decided to make my own version as my first game ever. This was a school assignment to make some version of an arcade game and make everything from scratch in Windows Forms. So everything you see - all the pictures, all the scenes and all the code in C# is mine. Unfortunatelly there are deadlines in this world, so the game has some bugs. But I still think it is very playable and even enjoyable.
